nodes.text: Daen Nark was a female Zabrak and the matriarch of the Blacklip Pirates. When the Galactic Empire blockaded the Anoat sector, she and her crew were trapped there. Nark reluctantly accepted that she had to make allies in the sector to survive.
Several months into the blockade, Nark was recruited by the Smuggler, who sent the pirate matriarch on a variety of missions across the sector.
